answers.answer: we still have all the things you listed in storage. i dont feel overwhelm since its my second pregnancy. hopefully we'll get around to it by June. 63 days to go.
I have 50 days and I am right there with you I feel overwhelmed even though this is my 2nd child I don't feel prepared at all!!

40 days to.go for me. I am excited but also scared. I want the.best for.my baby girl and afraid of anything bad that could happen. I have gestational diabetes and my baby girl is getting to big. I am hoping that she can hold on these last 6 weeks. Good luck to you keep us all posted
Am turner3 I forgot my password! Had to make new log in. We went to dr yesterday and she is head down! Is 3.5 lb and about 17 in long. Doc say she will be here early were hoping not to early.
hoping your baby will make it to full term. best of luck!
i feel the saaame !: (thers lots of stuff i still neeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeed omg! ftm

question: Any one else 60 days or less and don't feel prepared. We have all the clothes we need. Have blanket carseat.some bottles. Swing, bassinet. But there are still things I need. And I am starting to feel over whelmed.
title: 60 days!!!!!
